content:
# Upon returning to the stone furnace, I found that it is currently showing "no ingredients to smelt" and has no iron ore in its source. However, it has successfully produced 6 iron plates so far.
# 
# I need to insert the 10 iron ore from my inventory into the stone furnace to allow it to continue smelting.

# I'll insert the iron ore into the stone furnace now.
stone_furnace = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}, position=Position(x=-7.0, y=7.0))[0]  # Retrieve the stone furnace entity again.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 iron ore into the stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
